title: Bioshock Infinite - FLT
description:
This is the full Bioshock Infinite game repacked from http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/8300430/BioShock_Infinite-FLT simply decompressed from the terrible format it was in there and recompressed properly with 7z making this torrent 2.4GB smaller. Nothing was added, nothing was removed.
This is a fully functional fully cracked (thanks to Fairlight) copy of Bioshock Infinite. To install simply extract the ISOs from the 7z files with 7-zip, mount the first disc with Virtual CloneDrive and install while following the directions on when to insert the next disc. That's it, no patching, no replacing files, open the game and enjoy.
